description.value:
Creatures exposed to it must pass -10 Toughness Test or immediately take 1d5 Strength and Toughness damage, and an additional 1d5 per DoF (non-permenant, roll seperately for each). Requires -10 Chem-Use test to apply, load or handle it. Failiure counts as being exposed to the poison.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
